amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute consists of the text of the "Resolution of the Ethiopia-Eritrea Border Dispute Act of 2004" printed on pages H9030-H9032 in the Congressional Record for October 8, 2004.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Smith (MI).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
